data.text: "You are the world’s first responders to the climate emergency," @antonioguterres tells mayors at @C40Cities Summit, urging increased #ClimateAction. https://t.co/O5lUGQW3lD https://t.co/QXPCi8UbTl

In Sept 2018, @antonioguterres attended the historic signing of the peace deal between Eritrea & Ethiopia, which helped "reestablish an environment of peace in our troubled world".  

His statement today: https://t.co/X63FNkrfle https://t.co/RFEA12Qblb

Girls are unscripted.
Girls are unstoppable.
Girls can do anything - and everything!

Friday is #DayOfTheGirl: https://t.co/6LCeRO86ZQ via @UNICEF https://t.co/1IhfuFP0C3

“I want to speak my mind, even if I’m a girl.”

Meet Hasna, the 24-year-old advocating for gender equality & breaking barriers in sports in the #Maldives: https://t.co/MMR3uKinGF via @UNFPA https://t.co/mSnyNszA8X

1.1 billion girls
1 world
Unlimited dreams

Girls can do anything! Join @UN_Women in celebrating Friday's #DayOfTheGirl. https://t.co/f71WXU9WYf #GenerationEquality https://t.co/t834xzaQHp

"We need a significant shift in the way we consume, in the way we think, in the way we live. But it has to be done, and we can do it."

-- @UNEnvironment Goodwill Ambassador & SDG Advocate @deespeak about the urgent need to take #ClimateAction. Watch: https://t.co/dgtdKjQk7z https://t.co/7yqEEOtkoK

"Girls can be powerful agents of change, and nothing should keep them from participating fully in all areas of life. "

-- @antonioguterres on Friday's #DayOfTheGirl. https://t.co/I9oHG27zdK https://t.co/PT2b7S7I25

"Cities are critical, and they are largely where the battle will be won or lost."

-- @antonioguterres on the importance of cities taking #ClimateAction at the @C40cities World Mayors Summit. https://t.co/ZOfJzKf7Nt #Cities4Climate https://t.co/zgzqZvZ0Op

Every day, 33,000+ girls are forced into child marriage - a human rights violation that threatens the health & lives of girls around the world.

On Friday's #DayOfTheGirl, join @UNFPA's efforts to #EndChildMarriage once and for all: https://t.co/NRgI8ZzQ4j https://t.co/CfSqOGt3xf

The death penalty does little to serve victims or deter crime. 

170 countries have either abolished the death penalty or introduced a moratorium on its use. On Thursday‘s World Day Against Death Penalty & every day, #StandUp4HumanRights! https://t.co/URkQfh1BRS

"I don't believe in military solutions for the Syrian problem, or any other problem in the world."

-- @antonioguterres expressing his deep concern about the situation in eastern Syria. https://t.co/dUR0QuHtzB https://t.co/jSQOVeUbSw

Regular & adequate physical activity:
💪 Builds strong bones & muscles
⚕️ Protects from chronic diseases & many cancers
👩‍🎓 Supports learning & prevents cognitive decline
👴👵 Promotes healthy ageing

Cotton takes up just 2.1% of the world’s arable land, but meets 27% of the globe's textile needs.

It also provides a reliable source of income for 26 million farmers worldwide. More on Monday's #WorldCottonDay: https://t.co/RT8dMCVoj2 https://t.co/Z26Bz5wYg0
